fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, Taxation, Single market
eu_initiatives: Financial markets regulation, including capital/securities markets
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
legal_status: aisbl - ivzw (association internationale sans but lucratif) under Belgian law
goals__remit:
EUSIPA is the first and only pan European organization created to promote the interests of the structured investment products market which has grown strongly throughout Europe over the past years despite recent setbacks.  
 
The aim of the umbrella association is to coordinate future transparency initiatives at the European level and so create uniform standards in Europe. Through eusipa market participants can engage in direct discussions with the decision makers at European level.
